snippet: Energy companies and banks were among the early winners. The aluminum maker Alcoa sank 4 percent after reporting weaker-than-expected revenue.
abstract: Stocks rise on spike of energy shares due to reports that Saudi Arabia and Russia are moving to cut oil production.
lead_paragraph: Energy companies and banks were among the early winners. The aluminum maker Alcoa sank 4 percent after reporting weaker-than-expected revenue.

headline.main: Wall St. Gains on Mixed Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Report of Oil Reductions Lifts Shares
